job_title: Java Full Stack Developer with Angular

job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s Degree or an Advanced Degree (e.g. Masters, MBA, JD, MD, or PhD) or equivalent experience

jd: From: lakshmi, Unifysolutions lakshmi@unifysolutions.com Reply to: lakshmi@unifysolutions.com Role: Java Full Stack Developer with Angular (strong coding)Location: Phoenix, AZ Basic Qualifications:• 7 years of work experience with a Bachelor’s Degree or an Advanced Degree (e.g. Masters, MBA, JD, MD, or PhD) or equivalent experience.• You have full-stack engineer experienced with strong Angular and other technologies like JavaScript, Ajax, HTML5, SQL, CSS4, Redux, Riot.js and/or React.js• Expertise in relational database management systems including MS SQL and/or SQL Server.• Working on a small team, you must be able to work independently and quickly ramp up.• Extensive experience in Java, REST APIs, and JSON.• Able to clearly communicate and offer technical direction and recommendations to the team
